quote: But she was not even grateful to him for it; nothing good on Pierre's part seemed to her to be an effort, it seemed so natural for him to be kind to everyone that there was no merit in his kindness.
quote_letters: BUT SHE WAS NOT EVEN GRATEFUL TO HIM FOR IT NOTHING GOOD ON PIERRES PART SEEMED TO HER TO BE AN EFFORT IT SEEMED SO NATURAL FOR HIM TO BE KIND TO EVERYONE THAT THERE WAS NO MERIT IN HIS KINDNESS
